title: About transfer (read please)
body:
Hello.

While i was creating account i forgot about servers, and now my acc is on EU West, and still my friends are all on Nordic and East. Will i be able to transfer to Nordic once is online for free? Or i'll have to buy RP. I really want for my account to stay with this mail and everything and dont want to create new one on Nordic.

Sorry for my bad English and thanks in adnavce.

replies.body: Once the transfers come back they do in fact cost currency. Your best bet would be to go ahead and create a new account on the EUN server to play with your friends before progressing too much further!
